pullRequest.title: Issue #7722: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - AnnotationUseStyle
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolve #7722: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - AnnotationUseStyle
Diff report : https://wilcoln.github.io/checkstyle-reports/7722/diff/index.html
I ran regression on all projects and the diff report was so huge (1.2Gb+)  that  git add was taking forever to run. Beside, i'm not sure that github will allow me to upload such a load. So I've decided to host detailed reports for only the 8 first projects.
The number of violations has increased as there are often multiple violations on same line.
For example in the apache-struts project, this file contains two violations on line 71, at col 40 and 74 respectively.
Input files for UT's have been updated accordingly :

  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/annotationusestyle/InputAnnotationUseStyleDifferentStyles.java
    
    
         Line 81
      in
      3db6cfd
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Foo(@Another String par1, @Another int par2) {}

nodes.bodyText:
As I see, there should be tests

Default config
compact style
expanded style
closingParens = always
trailingComma = always

nodes.bodyText: No need to use custom annotation, @SuppressWarnings is fine
class names do not match test names
